finch.startFinch: This block is required for every Finch program.
finch.setLED: Sets a single color LED on port 1, 2, or 3 to a brightness value from 0% to 100%.
finch.setTriLED: Sets a tri-color LED on port 1 or 2 to the color specified by red, green, and blue brightness values. The values range from 0% to 100%.
finch.setPositionServo: Sets a position servo on port 1, 2, 3, or 4 to an angle from 0° to 180°.
finch.setRotationServo: Sets a rotation servo on port 1, 2, 3, or 4 to a rotation speed from -100% to 100%.
finch.getSensor: Reads the value of the sensor on port 1, 2, or 3. Readings for the distance sensor are given in cm. All other readings range from 0 to 100 (no units).
finch.getBattery: Reads the value of the battery in milliVolts. You may start to see strange behavior when the value is below 4630 mV.
